name: DC Universe Online: The Battle For Earth
name_original: DC Universe Online: The Battle For Earth
description:
DC Universe Online: The Battle For Earth is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by WBIE. It came out on 13-03-2012. Sony Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
DC Universe Online: The Battle For Earth is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
